word_mean_info__list.difference: 指特定的某一段时间，侧重事件持续时间的总长度。
侧重指习惯性的某一段时间，指继续的时间概念，突出事件发生的时刻

word_group.brief_definition: 旅程期间；在旅程期间；旅途期间
判决期间的；量刑时；量刑阶段
做爱时；做爱过程中；做爱当中
商议讨论；在深思熟虑中探讨

bilingual.target: 在假期期间，我们分享了。

bilingual.source: They look for food during the day.
During the night, we heard a noise!
bilingual.target: 夜里，我们听到了一阵响声！
他们总是在休息时间聊天。

bilingual.source: During the week, I'll wear smart clothes.
bilingual.target: 在工作日，我会穿得很得体。

bilingual.source: She is often much busier during festivals.
bilingual.target: 她在节日期间通常更忙。

bilingual.source: The weather is usually warm during the day.
bilingual.target: 白天的天气通常很暖和。

bilingual.source: What do you eat during the Spring Festival?

list.abstract: during（英[ˈdjʊərɪŋ]，美[ˈdʊrɪŋ]），英语单词，介词，意思为在…期间；在…的不断发展期间；在…期间的某一时候。短语搭配有during the day（白天），例句为“During the rosy years of elementary school, I enjoyed sharing my dolls and jokes.（在美好小学岁月中，我喜欢分享我的洋娃娃和笑话。）” during介词类近义词有in time of。

yingyinNormal.en: Choose one who was around during that time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 选一位在六十年代生活过的长辈。

yingyinNormal.en: So, Troy. I missed you during vacation. What'd you do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 特洛伊，我假期很想你，你都在做什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Must have been walled in during renovation decades ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肯定是几十年前翻修时就墙在里边了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, and you excelled during your service training. Excelled.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，你服役训练期间表现突出，出类拔萃。

yingyinNormal.en: Temple Fairs became especially popular during the Qing Dynasty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 庙会在清朝尤其盛行。

yingyinNormal.en: Our debate topic therefore, is false. The sun does not just shine during the day, it also shines during the night, just not on us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此我们的辩题是不成立的，太阳不仅是在白天才照射地球，它在晚上也会，只是没照到我们身上。

yingyinNormal.en: I did housework during the day and went to school at night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我白天做家务，晚上上夜校。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a brave man to take over during such difficult times.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真是勇敢，在如此艰难的时刻接手。

yingyinNormal.en: But that day, during the Quidditch match, Snape tried to kill me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可那天魁地奇比赛的时候，斯内普想要害死我。

yingyinNormal.en: How they could be during the standing of a patient is not accurate?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是病人忍受的他们又如何能有切身体会呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, does a good student drink seven beers during his first lesson?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好学生会在上第一堂课时喝掉七罐啤酒？

yingyinNormal.en: The sun shines during the day. Ms. Matthews will argue the affirmative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辩题是“太阳在日间照射”，有请正方马修斯小姐发言。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet weren't there two accidents on your test track during a rainstorm?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但在暴风雨中的测试中是不是出现过两次事故？

yingyinNormal.en: So we may experience the odd drop in coverage during the first 24 hours...
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以开始使用的前24小时可能会出现覆盖率下降的故障…

yingyinNormal.en: My brother was like you. During the second stage, he got good really fast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我弟弟和你一样，在第二阶段训练的时候，他很快就能逃出来。

yingyinNormal.en: I appreciate your coming here in person. Especially during the, final rush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我感谢你亲自过来，尤其在这最后冲刺阶段。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry. Just sit next to me during the quiz and you can copy my answers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心，测试时坐我旁边，你可以抄我的。

yingyinNormal.en: And if I've learned anything during that time, it's that you are who you are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我学到了什么的话，那就是：你就是你自己。

yingyinNormal.en: During his stay in space, he time traveled into his own future by 0.02 seconds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当他在太空的时候，他时空穿越到自己的未来，且用了0.02秒。

yingyinNormal.en: So you fell asleep during my movie. Big deal right? How do you clear this thing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看我的电影看到睡着了，没什么大不了的，对吧？这玩意要怎么消除？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: throughout the course of; at some point in the course of

examination_example.sentence: One accounting firm, EY, uses an AI system that helps review contracts <highlight>during</highlight> an audit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家会计公司EY使用人工智能系统，在审计过程中帮助审查合同。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>During</highlight> a separate observation, she saw that phones became a source of tension in the family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一次单独的观察中，她发现手机成了家庭紧张的来源。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>During</highlight> the decade before the economic crisis, spending on legal services in America grew twice as fast as inflation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经济危机之前的十年里，美国法律服务支出的增长速度是通货膨胀的两倍。

word_usage.usage:
during和for两个介词都有“在···期”之意，表示某事持续多久时不用 during，而用 for，for更侧重时间持续的总长度。during侧重在这段持续的时间内，事件发生的时刻。示例: 
误：I went to Wales during two weeks. 
正: I went to Wales for two weeks.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have proven that despite their poorly developed small eyes, these bats still can see <highlight>during</highlight> the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们已经证明，尽管它们的小眼睛发育不良，这些蝙蝠仍然可以在白天看到东西。

examination_example.sentence: They actually rely on their daylight vision and cannot fly <highlight>during</highlight> the night with no moonlight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，它们依靠白天的视觉，在没有月光的夜晚就无法飞行。

examination_example.sentence: First of all, guidance from adults should never be absent <highlight>during</highlight> the whole process of young people's growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，在年轻人成长的整个过程中，成年人的引导是不应该缺席的。

sense_info_list.en: at some point in the course of

examination_example.sentence: However, <highlight>during</highlight> critical situations, the outer core loses control and fails to regulate the impulses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在危急情况下，外核失去控制，无法调节冲动。

word_usage.usage:
during表示“在…期间”，是介词，不要将其误用作连词。
示例：他在巴黎期间，与他的朋友住在一起。　　
误：During he was in Paris, he lived with his friends.　　
正：While he was in Paris, he lived with his friends.　　
正：During his stay in Paris, he lived with his friends.

during 和 for 均可表示一段时间，但两者有差别。during 通常表示事件发生在何时（when），而for则表示事件持续了多长时间（how long）。
示例：He was in hospital for six weeks during the summer. 
他在夏天住了 6 个星期的医院。

在“数词+时间名词”前，以及在some time，a long time之类表示泛指一段时间的词组之前，可用介词 for，但不用 during。
示例：He lived here for ten years.
他在这儿住过 10 年。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: throughout the course of; at some point in the course of

examination_example.sentence: What we do know is that people tend to have different kinds of nightmares at different points <highlight>during</highlight> the sleep cycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们所知道的是，人们往往会在睡眠周期的不同时刻做不同类型的噩梦。

examination_example.sentence: Researching this phenomenon, another team asked volunteers to watch boring, sad, or neutral films, <highlight>during</highlight> which they could self-administer electric shocks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在研究这一现象时，另一个团队要求志愿者观看无聊、悲伤或中性的电影，在此期间他们可以自我实施电击。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>During</highlight> its flight, it reached 3, 000 feet and performed a series of gentle turns all over a safe area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在飞行过程中，该飞机到达了3000英尺的高度，并在一个安全区域进行了一系列温和的转弯。

word_usage.usage:
during 和 for 均可表示一段时间，但两者有差别。during 通常表示事件发生在何时（when），而for则表示事件持续了多长时间（how long）。
示例：He was in hospital for six weeks during the summer. 
他在夏天住了 6 个星期的医院。

during表示“在…期间”，是介词，不要将其误用作连词。
示例：他在巴黎期间，与他的朋友住在一起。　　
误：During he was in Paris, he lived with his friends.　　
正：While he was in Paris, he lived with his friends.　　
正：During his stay in Paris, he lived with his friends.

在“数词+时间名词”前，以及在some time，a long time之类表示泛指一段时间的词组之前，可用介词 for，但不用 during。
示例：He lived here for ten years.
他在这儿住过 10 年。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: There's also an area on the rooftop for hanging out with other travelers <highlight>during</highlight> the summer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夏天的时候，屋顶上还有一块地方可以和其他游客一起玩耍。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>During</highlight> the training stage, each dog was shown only the upper half or the lower half of the person's face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在训练期间，每只狗只看到人脸的上半部分或下半部分。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>During</highlight> the long trip home, following a weekend of hunting, Ehlers thought about the small dog he had seen trembling alongside the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在周末打猎后回家的漫长旅途期间，埃勒斯想到了他在路边看到的那只颤抖的小狗。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 旅程期间；在旅程期间；旅途期间

sense_info_list.en: throughout the course of; at some point in the course of

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>During</highlight> these times, people travelled by train or in carts pulled by horses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这些时期，人们乘火车或马车出行。

examination_example.sentence: Tooth brushing became popular <highlight>during</highlight> the World War I.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 刷牙在第一次世界大战期间开始流行

examination_example.sentence: You made great progress in English <highlight>during</highlight> the long winter vacation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在漫长的寒假里，你的英语进步很大。

word_usage.usage:
during表示“在…期间”，是介词，不要将其误用作连词。
示例：他在巴黎期间，与他的朋友住在一起。　　
误：During he was in Paris, he lived with his friends.　　
正：While he was in Paris, he lived with his friends.　　
正：During his stay in Paris, he lived with his friends.

during 和 for 均可表示一段时间，但两者有差别。during 通常表示事件发生在何时（when），而for则表示事件持续了多长时间（how long）。
示例：He was in hospital for six weeks during the summer. 
他在夏天住了 6 个星期的医院。

在“数词+时间名词”前，以及在some time，a long time之类表示泛指一段时间的词组之前，可用介词 for，但不用 during。
示例：He lived here for ten years.
他在这儿住过 10 年。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调习惯性的某一段时间，也指继续的时间概念，突出事件发生的时刻。
多指特定的某一段时间，或侧重事件持续时间的总长度。
